name: VR travel as a little tiny small dwarf
name_original: VR travel as a little tiny small dwarf
description:
This is a leisure game based on 3D VR technology. Players can take small roller coasters to visit different scenes.



There are four scenarios in this game: Lady ’s Office, Shower Room, Technolog City, and New York City. Each scene has unique styles and characteristics, allowing players to experience the stimulus and fun brought by the roller coaster in different environments.
In the game, players can control the speed of the roller coaster by themselves, making the touring process more exciting and interesting. If you like a fast -paced roller coaster, you can choose to speed up; if you want to better appreciate the surrounding scenery, you can choose to reduce the speed and slowly appreciate.
Through VR technology, this game allows players to be there, and feel the realistic roller coaster tour experience. You can see the details, buildings and other details in the scene environment. This surreal tour experience allows players to forget the troubles and pressures in the earth, and devote themselves to the game.



In general, this is a very interesting casual game that allows you to experience the charm of roller coaster tour in the virtual world. If you want to relax yourself, get rid of fatigue and stress, then this game will be a good choice, so that you can feel the wonderfulness of the roller coaster to visit the world at different speeds



Operation method:
1. The handle menu key displays the menu and switch the handle
2. The upper and lower keys on the handle change the speed of the roller coaster
